condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1, Part A 1 | Description :The Recipient shall: (i) establish and maintain, untilcompletion of the Project, a committee (the Steering Committee) with functions and responsibilities satisfactory to theAssociation; | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1, Part A 2 | Description :The Recipient shall (i) hire a Project coordinator, an assistantaccountant to be assigned to the MOE Planning Unit, and an assistant accountant to be assigned to the CPCE, all with qualification|Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1, Part A 3 | Description :The Recipient shall adopt a manual (the Operational Manual) in amanner acceptable to the Association, and thereafter carry out theProject in accordance with the provisions of said Operational M |Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: 1. TORs for administrative/ lecturer/distance education tutors completed for CPCE and University of Guyana
9. Percentage of CPCE and UG administrators, Department Heads, and Heads of Satellite Centers having completed the education management course
Number of additional qualified primary teachers resulting from project interventions.
11. The percentage of CPCE teacher educators scoring above 80 percent on their performance evaluations which includes classroom observation. (Effectiveness)
2. Number of nursery, primary and secondary teachers graduating from the 2 year ADE program. (Efficiency)
10. 45% of teacher educators will fulfill the minimum qualifications of their updated terms of reference in alignment with deliveryof the new Associates Degree. (Effectiveness)
6.The time (credit-hours) it takes to complete the initial compulsory teacher training is reduced from 3 to 2 years
7. The time (credit-hours) it takes to complete a Bachelor’s Degree (non-compulsory) teacher training is reduced from 4 to 2 years
5. Percent of teacher educators at both UG and CPCE using some form of ICT as a tool for teaching and learning
2. Evaluation tool for teacher educators finalized
4. New practicum and induction year offered to at least one cohort of ADE students
3. Evaluation tool for student teachers finalized and teacher educators trained in its use

actual.value: Teacher Educators using tool Teacher educators were trained in the use of the tool

title.narrative: 4. The percentage of student teachers at CPCE scoring at or above 65% on their practicum performance assessments (Effectiveness)
3. Teachers entering the 2 year B.Ed. program after graduating from the ADE. (Efficiency)
